amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the Department of Veterans Affairs by $630,000,000.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Salazar amendment (A010). Mr. Lewis (CA) stated that the legislation constituted legislation in an appropriations bill and was in violation of clause 2 of rule XXI. The Chair sustained the point of order.
